Question: how do i track my order
Generative Answer: You can track your order here: https://shop.lululemon.com/help/track-order. Check the status of your order or return here. If you have any other questions, you can reach out to our Guest Education Centre (GEC) by Live Chat, Apple Messages, phone or email. Phone number: 1.877.263.9300 | Hours: 6am – 6pm PT on weekdays, 6am – 4pm PT on weekends. You can also use our store locator to find a lululemon near you and to learn more about your store’s services and hours. Free shipping.

Question: what is your return policy
Generative Answer: If you’re having second thoughts about your purchase, and it was made within 30 days, you can return it! For more information, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/help/returns

Question: My entire order is missing. What do I do?
Generative Answer: Please check the status of your order or return here: https://shop.lululemon.com/help/track-order. If you need further assistance, please contact our Customer Service team.

Question: Hey, you sent me the wrong order
Generative Answer: I apologize for the inconvenience. To track your order or return it, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/help/track-order If you would like to return it, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/help/returns. If you need further assistance, please contact the Guest Education Centre (GEC) at 1.877.263.9300 or visit https://shop.lululemon.com/contact. for more information.

Question: Can you help me place an order
Generative Answer: You can place an order online and pick it up in-store. Here is the link with detailed instructions: https://shop.lululemon.com/story/buy-online-pick-up-in-store You can also find more information about services and hours at this link: https://shop.lululemon.com/story/services. If you have any other questions, you can contact us at 1.877.263.9300 or via Live Chat, Apple Messages, phone or email at this link: https://shop.lululemon.com/contact.

Question: how do i get the sweat collective membership
Generative Answer: You can learn more about the Sweat Collective Program and how to join here: https://shop.lululemon.com/about/sweat-collective You can also find answers to frequently asked questions about the program here: https://shop.lululemon.com/about/sweat-collective-faq

Question: how can i check my giftcard balance
Generative Answer: You can check your gift card balance by downloading the lululemon app and adding your gift card to your profile. You can also redeem your gift card in store by scanning the barcode. For more information, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/help/redeem-gift-card

Question: Can you help me find a Lululemon store that offers hemming services for pants?
Generative Answer: You can find a lululemon store that offers hemming services for pants by using our store locator here: https://shop.lululemon.com/story/services. Additionally, you can find more information about in-store services such as hemming, returns & exchanges, and lululemon Studio Mirror at our stores in Eugene, OR (https://shop.lululemon.com/stores/us/eugene/oakway-center.) and Milwaukee, WI (https://shop.lululemon.com/stores/us/milwaukee/thirdward).

Question: Can you provide information about Lululemon's loyalty program?
Generative Answer: You can find information about lululemon’s loyalty program at https://shop.lululemon.com/membership. This includes full lululemon Membership Terms and Conditions and lululemon Studio Terms and Conditions. You can also find information about lululemon’s Ambassador Program at https://shop.lululemon.com/story/our-programs and lululemon collective at https://shop.lululemon.com/about/sweat-collective.

Question: Do you have a sizing guide that I can follow?
Generative Answer: Yes, we do have a sizing guide. Please refer to our Fit Guide and Size Charts here: https://shop.lululemon.com/help/size-guide/mens. For lettered sizes, use the waist and hip measurements as a guide to pick the right size for you. For numbered sizes, our pants fit like your favorite chinos. If you’re a 32 in the pants you have at home, you’ll likely be a 32 in our pants. Bodies come in all shapes and sizes. Normally we select bottom sizes based off our waist size.

Question: If I purchase something online, can I return it in store?
Generative Answer: Yes, you can return an item purchased online to a lululemon store. According to our Returns page (https://shop.lululemon.com/help/returns), if you’re having second thoughts about your purchase, and it was made within 30 days, you can return it! You can also track your order or return here (https://shop.lululemon.com/help/track-order.). If you have any other questions, please reach out to our Guest Education Centre (GEC) by Live Chat, Apple Messages, phone or email. Phone number: 1.877.263.9300 | Hours: 6am – 6pm PT on weekdays, 6am – 4pm PT on weekends. You can find more information on our Contact Us page (https://shop.lululemon.com/contact).

Question: i want to work at lululemon
Generative Answer: You can learn more about the different ways to become a part of the lululemon collective by visiting https://shop.lululemon.com/story/our-programs. This page includes information about the Ambassador Program and the Sweat Collective Program.

Question: What are Lululemon's shipping options and delivery times?
Generative Answer: Lululemon offers free shipping and free returns on all orders. You can also pick up your order in-store. For more information, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/story/buy-online-pick-up-in-store. You can also track your order or return at https://shop.lululemon.com/help/track-order.. For more information about store services and hours, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/story/services.

Question: How can I unsubscribe from Lululemon email newsletters?
Generative Answer: You can unsubscribe from lululemon emails at any time by visiting this link: https://shop.lululemon.com/secure/account/email-landing.jsp?en-US;email-sign-up.

Question: What payment methods are accepted on the Lululemon website?
Generative Answer: You can use Afterpay or Klarna as your payment method at checkout when shopping online, in-app or in-store. Free shipping is available. For more information, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/story/installment-payments-buy-now-pay-later.. If you have any other questions, please reach out to gec@lululemon.com. or call our Guest Education Centre at 1-604-215-9300 or 1-877-263-9300 (toll free).

Question: where can i buy the MIRROR
Generative Answer: You can purchase the MIRROR through lululemon Studio All-Access Membership or at lululemon Howell Mill Store in Atlanta, GA. You can also use the Buy Online Pickup at Store option. For more information, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/story/lululemon-studio and https://shop.lululemon.com/stores/us/atlanta/howellmill and https://shop.lululemon.com/story/buy-online-pick-up-in-store.

Question: do i need to fill a return authorization form
Generative Answer: Yes, you need to fill out a return authorization form. You can find more information about our return policy here: https://shop.lululemon.com/help/returns.

Question: Why is the return authorization form important?
Generative Answer: The return authorization form is important because it allows you to return your purchase within 30 days. For more information, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/help/returns.

Question: I am not happy with the performance of my product. Can I return it?
Generative Answer: Yes, you can return a product if you are not happy with its performance. Please refer to the following link for more information: https://shop.lululemon.com/help/returns. It states that if you’re having second thoughts about your purchase, and it was made within 30 days, you can return it!

Question: Can I use my gift card to purchase some thing that is already discounted?
Generative Answer: Unfortunately, Gift Cards cannot be used in combination with the Sweat Collective or Military and First Responder discount for online transactions, but can be used in store. For more information, please refer to the following link: https://shop.lululemon.com/shop/luluGiftCards.jsp.

Question: Does lululemon have expedited shipping
Generative Answer: Unfortunately, lululemon does not offer expedited shipping. However, you can take advantage of free standard shipping when you shop the We Made Too Much Sale at https://shop.lululemon.com/c/sale/_/N-8t6. You can also pick up your order in-store with Buy Online Pick Up In-Store at https://shop.lululemon.com/story/buy-online-pick-up-in-store. For more information, please visit our Guest Education Centre at https://shop.lululemon.com/story/services.
